CHAT.comment: Chi sits at his desk as Mot stands behind him; Chi sort of resists the task; Mot suggests a few openings (Dear Mom , Dear Sheenan); the actual writing takes only a minute , and the rest of the time is spent in negotiations; except for the opening , it seems Chi decides on the text himself; Mot suggest more text but it isn't written
Dear mom i love you and care for you.

u.a: the writing pad has the alphabet written on it
talks with the EXP quietly while Chi writes
refers to the EXP's tape recorder
not sure which part was written here (maybe and care for you)
